text: @OliverDowden Not end of story. Either he’s lying, his wife is lying or both are lying. What person goes to visit elderly parents when they’ve got Covid19 symptoms. How many service stations did he contaminate. Lies, lies, endless lies,and you sycophants happy to promote them
